messages.title: I've called for JUST EQUAL TREATMENT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will fight to secure investment for Bradford.
I will continue to build on the improvements done by our council.
I will work with Trade Unions to improve the rights of workers.
I will ensure that we continue to invest in our health service.
I will fight to ensure that our education system gives our children the best possible life chances.

issues.health: Terry has helped deliver free bus passes, pension credits and free swimming. His efforts in defending pensions has helped give thousands of people peace of mind.

leaflet.personalStatement: Terry Rooney was born and raised in Bradford and is proud to be an MP in his home city. He has always been accessible to the people of the district with a City centre office and holds regular surgeries. His efforts in Parliament have led to millions of pounds of investment into Bradford for new health facilities, schools, extra police and regeneration projects throughout the district.

politicalExperience.achievements: Terry has helped deliver free bus passes, pension credits and free swimming. His efforts in defending pensions has helped give thousands of people peace of mind.

endorsements.endorsement: Terry has always worked to represent all the communities in his constituency to the best of his abilities.

quotes.text: Terry has helped deliver free bus passes, pension credits and free swimming. His efforts in defending pensions has helped give thousands of people peace of mind.

images.caption: Terry Rooney - A local man for local people
